column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:
column4: The outer loop is shutdown at Floyd Dr.  A portion of the inner loop is also shutdown.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:
column4: Injury collision between Floyd Dr and Meadow Ln.  Downed electric lines and ruptured gas line.  The gas has been shut off.
Inbound Athens Boonesboro Rd just prior to Hays Blvd
